top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Please use my music in a montage <3

I have those same drawer pulls in my rental kitchen and wouldn't recommend them. They stab me in the gut when I'm working at the countertop or catch on my clothes, they're hard to open especially with wet or oily fingers, they collect dirt since they're a flat surface - I'd go for something else personally.
